Class SimpleBoard

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.SimpleBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Board
public class SimpleBoard extends Object implements Board
An implementation of the Board interface, providing the core game logic for a Tetris-like game. It orchestrates interactions between the GameBoard, PieceManager, and Score components.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new SimpleBoard with a specified width and height.

    • SimpleBoard

      public SimpleBoard(int width, int height)
      Constructs a new SimpleBoard with a specified width and height. Initializes the game board, piece manager, and score components.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the game board.
      height - The height of the game board.
